page.title: 04The Day The Sch. Was Burgled
page.content: Hollinsclough School 1985 Charlie Futcher Age 8 On Thursday, 20th June,1985 at 8-30 a.m I came to school as usual.Some of the infants came rushing out yelling"We have been burgled!" At first I did not belive it but when I saw the office had been smashed I nearly fainted.The police arrived and we all watched the poiceman checking for finger prints.Soon a Joiner came and repaired the smashed door and window.They had taken a Sinclair Spectrum,Research Machine Moniter, an electric kettle and all the other eletric things,as well as quite a few bits and pieces.
